sqlMap.update:
update rate_setting
user_id = #userId:BIGINT#
status = #status:TINYINT#
auto_good_rate = #autoGoodRate:BIT#
auto_neutral_rate = #autoNeutralRate:BIT#
auto_bad_rate = #autoBadRate:BIT#
enable_sms_notify = #enableSmsNotify:BIT#
sms_notify_phone = #smsNotifyPhone:VARCHAR#
enable_credit_filter = #enableCreditFilter:BIT#
credit_filter_min = #creditFilterMin:INTEGER#
credit_filter_max = #creditFilterMax:INTEGER#
enable_good_rate_filter = #enableGoodRateFilter:BIT#
good_rate_filter = #goodRateFilter:REAL#
enable_bad_rate_filter = #enableBadRateFilter:BIT#
bad_rate_filter = #badRateFilter:REAL#
enable_register_day_filter = #enableRegisterDayFilter:BIT#
register_day_filter = #registerDayFilter:INTEGER#
enable_blacklist_filter = #enableBlacklistFilter:BIT#
last_rate_start_time = #lastRateStartTime:TIMESTAMP#
last_rate_end_time = #lastRateEndTime:TIMESTAMP#
rate_status = #rateStatus:TINYINT#
rate_owner = #rateOwner:VARCHAR#
add_time = #addTime:TIMESTAMP#
upd_time = #updTime:TIMESTAMP#
where id = #id:BIGINT#

update rate_setting set user_id = #userId:BIGINT#, status = #status:TINYINT#, auto_good_rate = #autoGoodRate:BIT#, auto_neutral_rate = #autoNeutralRate:BIT#, auto_bad_rate = #autoBadRate:BIT#, enable_sms_notify = #enableSmsNotify:BIT#, sms_notify_phone = #smsNotifyPhone:VARCHAR#, enable_credit_filter = #enableCreditFilter:BIT#, credit_filter_min = #creditFilterMin:INTEGER#, credit_filter_max = #creditFilterMax:INTEGER#, enable_good_rate_filter = #enableGoodRateFilter:BIT#, good_rate_filter = #goodRateFilter:REAL#, enable_bad_rate_filter = #enableBadRateFilter:BIT#, bad_rate_filter = #badRateFilter:REAL#, enable_register_day_filter = #enableRegisterDayFilter:BIT#, register_day_filter = #registerDayFilter:INTEGER#, enable_blacklist_filter = #enableBlacklistFilter:BIT#, last_rate_start_time = #lastRateStartTime:TIMESTAMP#, last_rate_end_time = #lastRateEndTime:TIMESTAMP#, rate_status = #rateStatus:TINYINT#, rate_owner = #rateOwner:VARCHAR#, add_time = #addTime:TIMESTAMP#, upd_time = #updTime:TIMESTAMP# where id = #id:BIGINT#

update rate_setting
user_id = #userId:BIGINT#
status = #status:TINYINT#
auto_good_rate = #autoGoodRate:BIT#
auto_neutral_rate = #autoNeutralRate:BIT#
auto_bad_rate = #autoBadRate:BIT#
enable_sms_notify = #enableSmsNotify:BIT#
sms_notify_phone = #smsNotifyPhone:VARCHAR#
enable_credit_filter = #enableCreditFilter:BIT#
credit_filter_min = #creditFilterMin:INTEGER#
credit_filter_max = #creditFilterMax:INTEGER#
enable_good_rate_filter = #enableGoodRateFilter:BIT#
good_rate_filter = #goodRateFilter:REAL#
enable_bad_rate_filter = #enableBadRateFilter:BIT#
bad_rate_filter = #badRateFilter:REAL#
enable_register_day_filter = #enableRegisterDayFilter:BIT#
register_day_filter = #registerDayFilter:INTEGER#
enable_blacklist_filter = #enableBlacklistFilter:BIT#
last_rate_start_time = #lastRateStartTime:TIMESTAMP#
last_rate_end_time = #lastRateEndTime:TIMESTAMP#
rate_status = #rateStatus:TINYINT#
rate_owner = #rateOwner:VARCHAR#
add_time = #addTime:TIMESTAMP#
upd_time = #updTime:TIMESTAMP#
where user_id = #userId:BIGINT#
sqlMap.select: SELECT t2.user_id FROM rate_setting t1,(SELECT user_id FROM rate_setting LIMIT $offset$,$limit$) t2 WHERE t1.user_id=t2.user_id;
